metadata.title: CVE-2021-35197 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In MediaWiki before 1.31.15, 1.32.x through 1.35.x before 1.35.3, and1.36.x before 1.36.1, bots have certain unintended API access. When a botaccount has a "sitewide block" applied, it is able to still "purge" pagesthrough the MediaWiki Action API (which a "sitewide block" should haveprevented).

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
